website_summaries.verdict: Users of this coffee-blend scrub notice a reduction in cellulite as well as skin softness. No greasy residue, unlike other brands.
pros: Fantastic smell, great texture, no greasy residue
Formulated with caffeine and Arabica bean to promote microcirculation
Shea butter hydrates and softens skin

customer_reviews.title: No oil slick in the shower! Yeah
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Farmhouse Fresh scrub. I like to exfoliate in the shower. Duh! But the oil based scrubs leave a oil slick that could be hazardous to your health. Sugar and salt dissolve when water inadvertently gets into the jar. This does neither. It has a gel like texture making it easy to spread, isn't bothered by a little water in the jar and has a heavenly smell. It's a little pricey but the proceeds help to rescue abused and neglected animals, like Otis the goat and Salt and Pepper and Arlo the donkeys and many others.
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Burnt coffee
customer_reviews.text: I typically love FarmHouse Fresh products. They have such yummy scents! But this I don't care much for. It definitely smells like coffee and caramel but don't confuse this scent with say a Starbuck's Caramel Frappuccino. It's not. I think of this more as a strong cup of Chevron gas station coffee that's been heating on the burner for hours with too many pumps of caramel creamer. Now the exfoliant, I love-which is probably the main factor in choosing this scrub. It doesn't dissolve in the shower like sea salt or sugar scrubs. But you do need to rinse well. I will purchase more FarmHouse Fresh scrubs in the future but probably stick to the Sweet Tea or Pineapple/Coconut scents.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mango

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! (smelling)
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what other reviewers are talking about. The smell of this polish is AMAZING. I love all things coffee and this does not disappoint. It also does a very nice job of exfoliating and hydrating at the same time. It's a bit creamery than other Farm Fresh polishes I've tried, but my favorite overall.
customer_reviews.author: snj201

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It smells so great and makes my skin softer than ever. I will definitely be purchasing this again... It is totally worth the money, but I wish it was cheaper! :)
customer_reviews.author: Melo0828

customer_reviews.title: I love all things coffee and this product receives an A ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this today. Product is just as I expected and the smell of this caramel coffee is heavenly. I love all things coffee and this product receives an A in my book. I will be reordering in the future once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: sarahhhhh

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BODY SCRUB EVER! Love the smell, and the results are truly amazing. I am hooked! I can NEVER go back to drug store scrubs now. Addictive, times 1000.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the product smells
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the product smells. It not only exfoliates but it also forms a thick lather leaving the skin softer and more moisturized. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: SheenanC

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Goodness
customer_reviews.text: This amazing scrub make me want to shower multiple times a day! Smells wonderful and makes my skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, smelll is amazing. You can't go wrong with Farmhouse Fresh products.....
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Smells great at first...
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing at first smell, then comes the very artificially plastic scent. Definitely not worth the price when you can’t get past that smell. Scrub part is good, but again that alone isn’t worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for the winter
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for the winter! Really helped with the cellulite on my thighs after using it for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Farmhouse Fresh Farmhouse Fresh Body Polish , Triple Shot Caramel Coffee, 13.6 oz
product_meta.description:
A rich, whipped, natural and fragrant body scrub. Formulated with caffeine and Arabica bean extract to promote microcirculation. Blended with Shea Butter to hydrate and soften skin. Scented with creamy, delectable caramel coffee. Leaves body skin smooth, radiant and healthy looking. Paraben and sulfate-free

BRAND STORY
At FarmHouse Fresh, you'll find skincare products grown and crafted with delicious epicurean flair that are either certified organic or up to 100% natural. Proudly made in the U.S.A. We pursue three passions: GROW. SPA. RESCUE.

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
